Subject: Re: The Story So Far (OOC about NBW story line)


> OOC: Yo, lord Unitron, get your facts straight about Vulois.  he was
> only looking for peace, not an organic Cybertron(thats Cyberwolfs
> department, go kill his characters).  Also, my Soundwave WAS the
> original bot in new body.  Just because he transformed into an
> alligator and a bat does not mean he was the mutant.
>
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > The Story so Far....
> >
> >  The story begins after Beast Wars third season...
> >
> >   Megatron had returned back to Cybertron under arrest by Optimal
> Optimus and
> > the other Maximals. He was placed on a death row while matters that
> > transpired during the Beast Wars were being settled between the
> Maximals and
> > Predacons.
> >    Elsewhere, the Predacon Premier, Hell Beast, made plans to
> finish what
> > Megatron had started only a few years earlier. By collecting enough
> energon,
> > he could provide enough power to crush the Maximals once and for
> all, and put
> > Cybertron into Predacon rule. He enlisted the help of
> some "friends". With
> > the help of his allies, he was able to steal a Predacon warship and
> travel
> > back in time to prehistoric Earth via transwarp technology. Once
> there, more
> > allies planned on joining him, along with rogue Predacons seeking
> their own
> > future.
> >    Back at Cybertron, Maximal hero Liono Prime took action against
> this
> > outrageous act and he too travelled back in time with his own crew.
> >     Both teams battled for a while, new allies and new factions
> popping up
> > over time.  Eventually, the Maximal Blue Stinger hid the Autobots
> in a secure
> > and unknown location, while Hell Beast held the Decepticons deep
> within the
> > bowels of his warship.  For a time, battles ensued with little
> military gain.
> >  During this period, a few soldiers on each side were killed off,
> in example
> > enemies Adrax and Autofire combated each other, but then fell to an
> icy doom
> > while in combat.  Still, there were twice as many troops arriving
> for each
> > faction as news reached Cybertron of the ensuing battle.
> >     As time passed, the flow of new troops slowed down, but the
> Predacons had
> > a little over twice as many robots in their ranks in the Maximals.
> >     A major event transpired that must be delved into in great
> detail because
> > of the key importance it has in the future of the Alliance.
> >
> >     Zardus originally started out as a Predacon in Hell Beast's
> Predacon
> > faction.  Zardus was a hacker/engineer, and his first task was to
> prove his
> > loyalty.  He was ordered to accompany Inferno and Rampage on an
> attack
> > against a human village, led by the human known as Proto (not to be
> confused
> > with the Proto under the Maximal Kluster's leadership).  Zardus
> proved
> > himself, by the time the battle was over Zardus had lost two limbs
> and been
> > blown through a stone wall.  He returned with Inferno and Rampage
> back to
> > Hell Beast's warship, leaving the proto-human village inf lames.
> He was
> > repaired and then given his first (and final) official assignment
> for the
> > Predacons.  To improve Predacon defense capabilities.  He succeeded
> with
> > flying colors.  When the Maximal Silverbolt came into firing range
> of the
> > base, he was shot into stasis lock and taken prisoner.  But a
> surprise attack
> > consisting of the Maxis Rattrap, Doggus, and Armdabot was able to
> recover
> > Silverbolt and take Zardus prisoner.  But an attack by the
> Predacons rescued
> > Zardus.
> >     Several days later, Hell Beast cracked some codes on a disk he
> had,
> > discovering that the resting place of a great Predacon warrior lay
> in great
> > lakes of lava.  Hell Beast went off to the lava pools and left
> Zardus in
> > charge.  Things went smoothly until Hell Beast arrived at the lakes
> of fire,
> > and activated this warrior, who was Adrax (the first and final
> character to
> > be Decepticon size).
> >     Adrax soon tried to take control of the Predacons, and there
> was a giant
> > battle, uniting both the Maximals and the Predacons.  Zardus headed
> out to
> > help in the battle, but two stasis pods crash landed, keeping him
> from aiding
> > in the fight.  One pod belonged to Blue Stinger, who he proceeded
> to put in
> > stasis lock and start to drag off towards the Predacon base, but
> was rescued
> > by the Maximals.
> >     So Zardus went to the other pod, and converted him, Wolfgang,
> into a
> > Predacon, and they headed off to battle Adrax.  Adrax seemed
> unstoppable,
> > eating Hell Beast who possessed a strange device.  The device was a
> temporal
> > disturber that rewound time back by several days. Blue Stinger was
> recovered
> > by the Maximals, but Zardus still got Wolfgang. No one had any idea
> Adrax
> > existed, save Zardus, thanks to him arriving to the battle late.
> Zardus
> > started having hallucinations about it though.  Back at the
> Predacon base,
> > Wolfgang began complaining about having nothing to occupy himself.
> Zardus,
> > frustrated at the hallucinations lashed out, and a battle broke out
> between
> > the two.  In the middle of the battle, Zardus had a hallucination,
> and when
> > he came out of it the main computer for Hell Beast's ship had been
> shot.  The
> > two were immediately thrown into the brig.
> >     The two managed to break out, Zardus turning the defense system
> he had
> > created against all the other Predacons (except Wolfgang who was
> with him),
> > and the two fled.  They made their way to the Transmystics (a Vok
> faction).
> > The Vok faction welcomed them.  Not to long later, Zardus and
> Wolfgang found
> > a giant energon crystal, which they planned to use against everyone
> on Past
> > Earth.  But the Transmystics found out, and the Transmystic leader,
> > Firestorm, accidentaly shot the crystal, igniting.
> >     When Wolfgang and Zardus came to, they found their bodies had
> been
> > upgraded somehow in the blast.  Later on the Transmystics fizzled
> out and the
> > faction was gone.  The duo soon joined the Maximals, where not to
> long after
> > there was a huge battle.  The Predacons had made an offensive
> strike against
> > the Maximal base.  Zardus saw an opportunity, and headed for the
> Predacon
> > base.  But Scorponok stopped him from blowing up the base with a
> > self-destruct sequence, and the ceiling collapsed on the two.  When
> the other
> > Predacons returned after a retreat, Hell Beast dug Zardus out and
> took him to
> > a pit of lava (not near Adrax's pits), and tossed him in.  Wolfgang
> attempted
> > to aid his comrade, but fell in the pit.  The energon residue left
> from the
> > crystal on the two blended with the lava to upgrade their bodies
> once more.
> > After they got out of the pit, they returned to the Maximal base.
> >     Another stroke of genius struck Zardus, who headed off to the
> lava pits
> > where Adrax was.  He was intercepted by Predacons who forced him to
> retreat,
> > and then they reprogrammed Adrax so he was loyal to the Predacon
> cause.
> >      Not to far off in the future the Predacon and Maximal bases
> launched off
> > into the air and opened fire on each other.  Zardus and Wolfgang
> fled, but a
> > power drew Zardus to an orb.  The orb burned into Zardus' left
> palm, and
> > upgraded his body.  The orb explained it was a Vok that had tried
> to
> > eliminate the Maximals and Predacons in the Beast Wars.  It then
> ordered him,
> > after quite a bit of torture, to create his own faction to
> eliminate all the
> > factions on Past Earth.  Zardus flew back to Wolfgang and showed
> off his
> > power, and they agreed to create the new faction.
> >     Zardus and Wolfgang united with a mercenary group called the
> Contracons
> > to start their new faction.  The base of operations for this new
> faction was
> > the Contracons' own base.  Other robots soon joined them, including
> Rattrap,
> > Doggus, and Ominous Prime.  They built a new base, and fought in
> the war for
> > a long, long time, assisting the Maximals.  There were some
> arguments, but in
> > the end the faction was called 'The Alliance'.  Eventually,
> Wolfgang
> > convinced Zardus to split the Alliance from the Maximals and become
> > completely seperate.
> >
> >     So, as time passed, forces continued growing slowly, the
> Alliance being
> > the largest faction that wasn't with the Preds or Maxis. Though
> they were the
> > weakest in comparison with the Maximals and Predacons.
> >     Time passed as fighting broke out again and again.  Nothing
> really major
> > occured.  The three major factions were at a stalemate.  None could
> take the
> > other out.  It remained that way for a long, long time.
> >     But, a great variable changed the direction of the Neo Beast
> Wars.
> > Instead of just a complete Predacon or Maximal victory that was
> apparent, the
> > Alliance began to rapidly grow.  Being more organized with a
> competent
> > leader, the orb departing from Zardus' palm, and faster response
> time, the
> > Alliance was able to retrieve most of the stasis pods, growing
> quite rapidly
> > in numbers.  Soon the Alliance was just a little more than half the
> size of
> > the Predacons.  But, as stated before, they were more organized and
> were a
> > strong force, almost as equal as the Predacons and Maximals.
> >     The Ark itself became the base of operations for the Maximals,
> and the
> > Ark was piloted to the Himalayan Mountains.   It became more
> appartent to the
> > Maximals as time went on that a major roadblock in their success
> was their
> > leader, Liono Prime, who seemed rather incompetent.  Still, the
> Maximals put
> > up with him.
> >     The first sign of Liono's imminent fall from leadership was
> when the
> > Alliance engaged two new Maximals who had just arrived on Past
> Earth.  One of
> > Maximals was killed, Reroute, and Ramhorn, the other openly blamed
> Liono, and
> > telling it too everyone else.
> >     The Predacons and Alliance joined forces on more than one
> occassion to
> > attack the Ark over and over.  The Predacons and Alliance also
> attacked
> > seperately.  Each battle left the Ark badly damaged, most defenses
> gone, and
> > most forces in CR chambers.  The Maximals blamed Liono Prime for
> their
> > constant defeats.
> >     It continued in this manner for sometime as the Predacon and
> Alliance
> > forces began hurtin the Ark more and more, inflitrating a few times
> and
> > damaging computers and CR chambers.
> >     But, a break came for the Maximals.  The Predacon Megatron,
> from the
> > first Beast Wars, tried to usurp Hell Beast with the aid of Tankor,
> > Quickstrike, Inferno, and a few others.  But his plot failed, and
> he left
> > with his men to build a new base.  Time and time Megatron tried to
> usurp Hell
> > Beast.
> >     Eventually he succeeded, Quickstrike taking control of the
> Predacon
> > computer and turning internal defenses against its occupants.
> >     Hell Beast and his loyal supporters retreated to a crashed
> craft that had
> > been a prison transport that crash landed on Past Earth.  It had
> transported
> > three Predacons loyal to Hell Beast.  They used the still
> functioning CR
> > chambers, and retook the base.  Megatron later on took the form of
> a
> > diagnostic drone to inflitrate the base and spy.
> >     A mercenary group, the Oblitercons, landed, fleeing Cybertron,
> and joined
> > the Alliance.  After terms were discussed they were sent by Zardus
> to aid
> > Megatron so he could usurp Hell Beast and make everything topsy-
> turvy for the
> > Preds.  Megatron insulted the Oblitercon leader, who opened fire on
> > Megatron's diagnostic drone form, nearly killing him.  But he
> fled.  They
> > proceeded to damage Quickstrike's already badly damaged leg, and
> then
> > returned to base.  Megatron returned to his biped form.
> >     The Oblitercons turned out to be a gestalt form, creating the
> giant 45
> > foot tall gestalt Oblitertron.  This boosted the Alliance into the
> spotlight
> > as the strongest faction in the Neo Beast Wars.  The Oblitercons
> are also
> > important because they were the very first gestalt team to take
> part in the
> > Neo Beast Wars.
> >     With their new gestalt, the Alliance began thrasing the Ark,
> with the
> > help of more new recruits.  They began to not only inflitrate the
> base, but
> > got to the Ark's bridge and damaged Teletran-1 and 2 several
> times.  The
> > Maximals also seemed to be a little scared of Oblitertron.
> >     A new group arrived, called the Newcomers.  Lead by Koga Shuko,
> CEO of
> > Pred Tech Incorporated and Shuko Inc., and Set, another wealthy
> Predacon and
> > business owner.  As Maximals arrived on scene to check out their
> crashed
> > ship, the Newcomers attacked them, and took the fight to the Ark.
> It was
> > later learned that Koga Shuko and Set were the creators of the
> Oblitercons.
> > They had hoped to sell gestalts for amazing prices and become ten
> times
> > richer.  But the Oblitercons broke free from the lab where they
> were created,
> > and blew the laboratory up, and fled to Past Earth where they were
> shot down
> > by Shuko's men.  Now an expedition had been led to Past Earth to
> retrieve
> > energon and either capture or kill the Oblitercons.
> >     The two wealthy Predacons brought along with them a gestalt.
> Dark
> > Messiah.  Who was made up by the gestalt team, the Dieties.  Each
> Diety was
> > based on some god from Earth mythology, the mythologies being Greek
> and
> > Egyptian.  Ra, the team leader. And Hades, Ares, Zeus, and Anubis.
> They
> > proved to be quite the nuisance.
> >     As time went on, the Newcomers dished out much disaster.  In
> result of a
> > battle between the Newcomers and Oblitertron, a base belong to
> the 'Chosen
> > Ones' was destroyed.  The Ark also took some shots that it would
> never
> > recover from. But, eventually Set went missing and Ra switched over
> to the
> > Predacon side under Hell Beast's command.
> >     A great Predacon warship titled the "Iron Fist" landed on an
> island, the
> > faction inside calling themselves the Militrons.  They began to
> construct
> > island into a supposedly impenetrable fortress.
> >     Alliance leader Zardus set out for negotiations and formed a
> slight
> > alliance, while Megatron erected a truce between his Predacon
> forces adn the
> > Militrons.
> >     Meanwhile, during a battle at the Alliance base, Koga Shuko
> found a fang
> > that was made of metal instead of calcium carbonite.  He returned
> to his base
> > with his minions, and cloned the source of the metal fang.  What he
> got was a
> > clone of the Predacon warrior Serpentor. Serpentor had been loyal
> to Hell
> > Beast and in a battle was captured.  In an attempt to escape, he
> > self-destructed in an attempt to do as much damage as he could
> seeing th end
> > was near.
> >     After seeing that he would die if he didn't help Koga, he aided
> him.
> > Even with the extra-firepower, it didn't help all that much.  Soon
> an
> > intruder was found.  The Maximal Amobeous.  He had found an
> underground base
> > by going into his amobea form and travelling on an unidentifed
> robot.  Koga
> > Shuko learned the information, and killed him, and alerted all
> factions in an
> > attempt to attack them while they were investigating.  It didn't
> work.  No
> > one went looking.
> >     Soon, it became apparent to Shuko that he couldn't win in his
> current
> > position of power.  So he pulled out his wild card.  Sixshot.
> Named after
> > the first Cybertronian STAG (Solo Transformer Assault Group).  He
> had the
> > same abilities and look.  He proved to be a valuable asset.  But in
> the end,
> > he failed to change the tide.  In one attack, a bridge officer of
> the
> > Newcomers' was knocked into stasis lock and died of wounds.  Some
> of the
> > Dieties were blown apart.  In the end, the Newcomer Unitron,
> Shuko's second
> > in command, killed the other bridge officer and Hades.  He crippled
> Koga
> > Shuko and set the self-destruct sequence.  He then left the ship as
> fast as
> > he could, the base exploding.  Only three other Newcomers escaped.
> Sixshot,
> > Ares, and Serpentor.  No one else knew what happened to the
> Newcomer base.
> > It simply blew up.
> >     The Neo Beast Wars was relatively quiet, except for the average
> Alliance
> > attack.  The Alliance grew bigger.  The Predacons began to
> seperate.  The
> > Maximals sat in their Cybertronian Fire.  Their fortress.  As the
> Ark lay
> > barely guarded and most of it rather damaged. A surprising turn of
> events was
> > when Tigerhawk, Blue Stinger, Keyura, and the Maximal leader Liono
> Prime left
> > suddenly, leaving the Maximal Iron Raptor in charge of the Maximal
> cause.
> > The Maximals looked up to her for hope, and the Predacons and
> Alliance were
> > worried.  Now that the Maximals didn't have an incompetent oaf for
> a leader,
> > could they be a true factor in the Neo Beast Wars?
> >     Soon repairs started upon the Ark.  Just a little later, Zardus
> > disappeared, not before leaving Nemesis Enforcer, the second-in-
> command of
> > the Alliance in charge of his faction.  Zardus often disappeared
> for unknown
> > reasons.  Nemesis Enforcer learned of the effort to rebuild the
> Ark.  So he
> > launched an all out attack on the Ark, badly damaging it.  Teletran-
> 1 and 2
> > were destroyed.  Shields were gone.  All outer defenses were
> obliterated.
> > The CR chambers were destroyed.  The only thing that really worked
> was Iron
> > Raptor's personal computer program, IRIS, which existed in the Ark.
> >     Zardus returned, and reminded Nemesis Enforcer that if the Ark
> was
> > destroyed, most likely the Alliance would follow, and it wasn't in
> their best
> > interests.  But Nemesis Enforcer is known as a psychotic robot.
> >     Things remained at a norm.  The relationship between the
> Maximal Prowl
> > and Maxi leader Iron Raptor grew as they spent a several day night
> in Iron
> > Raptor's room.  It's unknown what they did...but there are educated
> guesses...
> >     A surprising thing happened.  Vulois, a Predacon entered the
> Neo Beast
> > Wars and found a Transmetal Three Drive.  He shortly served under
> Hell Beast,
> > after turning himself and a few others into Transmetal Threes.
> Hell Beast
> > attacked Vulois though, since Vulois held the TM3 Drive and had
> tried to get
> > members of Hell Beast's group to usurp, and took him prisoner and
> destroyed
> > Drive.  Vulois and his followers escaped though.
> >     Later, there was an explosion, and it is rumored that Vulois'
> sister
> > died, while he was visited by the Oracle and the Matrix and told
> that he was
> > to unite the factions on Past Earth and start up an organic
> Cybertron.  He
> > set out with his two helpers, the female Baterra, and Soundwave.
> Not to be
> > confused with the G1 Soundwave.
> >     Vulois would handle diplomatic relations with the Predacons.
> Battera the
> > Maximals.  And Soundwave the Alliance.  They hoped with the three
> major
> > factions united as one, the other swould soon follow.  Vulois built
> a base,
> > called the Embassy, and employed the help of other robots, many
> resembling
> > angels.  And a young powerful robot called Child who had a great
> mass of
> > powers but needed training.
> >     Battera was met with suspicion at the Cybertronian Fire.
> Vulois never
> > made it to the Predacons.  He was to busy at the Embassy. Soundwave
> never
> > returned from the Alliance base.  He was led into a conference
> room, but was
> > murdered by the Alliance.  The last thing they wanted was peace
> between
> > anyone, and especially peace that wouldn't help their agendas.
>
>
>
>
>
